layout.NB: Currenly only Rafayel's page is available

home.intro header: Welcome to Love and Deepspace Battles Page
home.here: Here you will be able to learn all about companion mechanics from LADS.
home.I started playing: I started playing LADS at the first half of ‘25 and finding how to build this or that character was hard especially since each of them have several playable companions and it is completely ungooglable! I have experience playing other games and there are always guides pages on tha topic! And i am still astonished that there are no fan page dedicated to LADS’s battle mechanics especially since it is a big part of the game.
home.I cannot say: I cannot say that i am an expert in the sphere but i wanna make a page there people (especially battle newbies) will be able to understand how to use companions they have in the easiest way possible. Since game description are extremely long and fan-made guides are hard to find (from my personal experience).
home.At the moment: At the moment I am planning on adding all the playable companions onto the page. Protocores have general descriptions and recommendations for each companion. No cards or any other non-battle related information are in the plans. For general game information you can check fandom wiki etc.
home.Ending: Help and mistake corrections will be appreciated! Let all your trials be as easy as falling with LADS men, Deepspace Hunters!

protocoreSection.introStandart: If the card stellactrum fully match the stage's requirments use protocores with the main stat as 'DMG to Weakened' or 'Oath Recovery', otherwise 'CRIT DMG' and 'Expedited Energy'.
protocoreSection.introSolar: The way you want to build myth companions is slightly different. For solar pairs β protocore might change depending on the Ranks your have.

r0.r0_abysswalker: R0: Oath Recovery and Expedited Energy

r1.abysswalker: R1: Oath Strength and Expedited Energy

r2+.abysswalker: R2+: Oath Strength and ATK/Expedited Energy

protocoreSection.chooseProtocores: choose protocores based on your needs

substatsChoice.basic: For substats priorities protocores with ATK, crit rate, CRIT DMG, DMG to Weakened

protocoreSection.solarCardsInfo: Solar cards use α (alpha) and β (beta) protocores. α has a fixed main HP stat while β's main stat derives.
protocoreSection.lunarCardsInfo: Lunar cards use γ (gamma) and δ (delta) protocores. γ has a fixed main ATK stat while δ's main stat derives.
protocoreSection.critBuildsInfo: For crit builds don't forget to check your crit rate before entering the stage. for comfortable ratio aim for 60-80% crit rate. remember your CRIT DMG doesn't matter if you do not utilize it.
protocoreSection.OathInfo: Usually your companion will be able to use Oath once during the battle. To use it twice use 'Oath Recovery' for β protocore.
protocoreSection.energyInfo: Your skill and Resonance skill require special energy ◆, to regenerate it faster use Expedited Energy for β protocore.

abysswalker.r0: Starting Effect: The team deals 8% more DMG and takes 8% less DMG. Abysswalker`s [Deepsea Pursuit] gains 30% additional CRIT DMG.
abysswalker.r1: Boosts Ardent Oath charge by 20%. When fighting together with Abysswalker, increases DMG taken of enemies inflicted with [Burn] by 20%.
abysswalker.r2: Energy Charge limit is raised by 1. When triggering [Potential] recovery, Energy Charge recovery speed is increased by 50% for 4s.
abysswalker.r3: The team deals 8% more DMG. Abysswalker`s [Searing Slash] deals 150% more DMG. When triggering [Beacon], additionally restore 1 [Potential].

god_of_the_tides.r0: Starting Effect: The team deals 8% more DMG and takes 8% less DMG. When fighting near a [Sea Spirit], CRIT DMG is increased by 10%.
god_of_the_tides.r1: Increases Ardent Oath charge by 20%. The [Sea Spirit] starts at Lv. 2 and its duration is extended by 5 seconds.
god_of_the_tides.r2: Energy Charge limit is raised by 1. During [Heavenly Rain], Energy Charge recovery speed is increased by 30%.
god_of_the_tides.r3: The team deals 8% more DMG. [Surging Tides] restores 30% [Faith] for each enemy hit. This effect can trigger at most 3 times during.

lemurian_sea_god.r0: Starting Effect: The team deals 8% more DMG and take 8% less DMG. When your basic attack hits, [Sea God Mark] cooldown is reduced by 0.8s. This effect can trigger once per attack. When [Lightning Tide] hits Weakened enemies, extends the Weakened duration by 0.5s. This effect can trigger up to 2 times per enemy.
lemurian_sea_god.r1: Increases Ardent Oath charge by 20%. While [Divine Favor] is active, when Rafayel throws his Tidebreaker Trident, it generates an additional vortex that continuously pulls nearby enemies toward its center. While [Divine Favor] is active, lightning will randomly strike the battlefield to assist you in battle, dealing DMG equal to 270+144% ATK+571% DEF with each hit.
lemurian_sea_god.r2: Energy Charge limit is raised by 1. DMG boost from [Sea God Mark] is increased by 50%. While [Divine Favor] is active, you gain 40% DMG Reduction.
lemurian_sea_god.r3: The team deals 8% more DMG. While [Divine Favor] is active, when your basic attack hits, Active Skill cooldown is reduced by 0.5s. While [Divine Favor] is active, when Charged Attacks empowered by [Sea God Mark] hit, [Lightning Tide] is triggered for 70% DMG. These effects can trigger once per attack.

support_skill.name: Scarlet Shade
support_skill.description: Rafayel creates a Scarlet Shade dealing AoE DMG and and inflicting Burn. Also leaves 3 [Flame Lilies].

resonance_skill.name: Scorching
resonance_skill.description: You ignite all [Flame Lilies] dealing AoE DMG and inflicting Burn. Each of [Flame Lilies] increases your ATK by 5% for 8s.

ardent_oath.name: Searing Motif
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive AoE DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Flowing Flame
passive_skill.description: When you and Rafayel's skills hit enemy, he summons up to 5 [Flame Lilies] dealing AoE DMG. When 10 [Flame Lilies] are utilized, Rafayel's Basic Attack DMG and attack range are increased.

support_skill.name: Swirling Colors
support_skill.description: Rafayel forces the enemy into the air and kicks them to the ground. Inflicts up to 2 stacks of [Tinctus].

resonance_skill.name: Illuminating Strength
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel perform a series of attacks.

ardent_oath.name: Dazzling Kaleidoscope
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive AoE DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Gilded Tinctus
passive_skill.description: Hitting enemies with [Tinctus] by [Active Skill], [Resonance Skill] or [Ardent Oath] will deal DMG to enemies and restore you and him HP. When 5 stacks are detonated, the enemy's DEF will be reduced by 20% for 5s.

support_skill.name: Aria
support_skill.description: Rafayel thrusts forward, dealing AoE DMG and reducing enemy's movement speed by 30% for 5s. It leaves behind [Reprice], it deals bigger DMG and reduces enemy's movement speed by 50% for 5s.

resonance_skill.name: Concerto
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel deal ATK DMG. If enemy inflicted by [Echo], they recieve additional ATK DMG.

ardent_oath.name: Sonata of Reunions
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do a slash, dealing massive AoE DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Recitativo
passive_skill.description: Whe you and Rafayel deal DMG, you will sing Harmony, next time you use [Aria] it will leave [Echo] behind for 5s. It increases the DMG enemies take and additionally they lose HP based on Rafayeal ATK per second.

support_skill.name: Eclipse Rend
support_skill.description: Click Rafayel's icon when ready, or trigger with perfect dodge.• Leaves [Fishtail Beacon] on a ground (restores 2 Potential on pick) • At max [Potential], becomes empowered and Burns enemies

resonance_skill.name: Fantasia Shark
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel pull in enemies with chains. Fantasia Shark bites and burns them after.

ardent_oath.name: Four Scourges
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do massive DMG based on your combined ATK.

passive_skill.name: Abyssal Beacon
passive_skill.description: Periodically Rafayel applies [Beacon] on enemies. Hit it with a charged attack to collect 1 [Potential].

basic_attack.name: Abyssal Rapid Fire
basic_attack.description: Wield dual guns for a combo up to 5 hits. Charged Attack will knock back nearby enemies.

my_passive_skill.name: Abyssal Shadow
my_passive_skill.description: Combo Attack provide buffs on each hit up to 5 stacks. 1 stack increases ATK Speed by 4% and CRIT Rate by 2%.

active_skill.name: Oceanic Traversal
active_skill.description: You perform one big DMG shot from your guns.

support_skill.name: Tidal Summoning
support_skill.description: Summons a [Sea Spirit]. Empowered [Tidal Summoning] restores 10% [Faith] and increases [Sea Spirit] DMG by 10%.

resonance_skill.name: Surging Tides
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel summon tides dealing DMG based on your ATK + HP.

ardent_oath.name: Oceanic Harmony
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel summon a whale, dealing massive  DMG based on your combined ATK + HP.

passive_skill.name: Frenzy Surge
passive_skill.description: Your, Rafayel's and [Sea Spirit]s' hits restore [Faith]. When it is full, it triggers [Heavenly Rain] increases DMG dealt by 30% and boosts the level of all [Sea Spirit]s by 1.

basic_attack.name: Waves
basic_attack.description: Deals multi-hit combo up to 4 attacks based on your ATK + HP. Charged Attack launches enemies.

my_passive_skill.name: Sea Shanty
my_passive_skill.description: When using an [Active Skill], summons a [Sea Spirit].

active_skill.name: Tides
active_skill.description: Pushes back enemies and deals DMG based of your ATK + HP and leaves a [Tidal Field]. It provides Tidal Strength that increaces CRIT Rate by 10% and stacks up to 3 times.

support_skill.name: Tide Cleaver
support_skill.description: Throws his Trident dealing DMG based on ATK + DEF to enemies in range.

resonance_skill.name: Cerulean Verdict
resonance_skill.description: You and Rafayel unleash towering waves pulling enemies inside it and dealing massive DMG based on ATK + DEF.

ardent_oath.name: Oceanic Harmony
ardent_oath.description: You and Rafayel do massive DMG based on your combined ATK + DEF.

passive_skill.name: Deepfall Rite
passive_skill.description: Upon enterting the battle, Rafayel grants you a [Sea God Mark]. Charge Attack consumes it and it will be restored in 8s again. It is extremely powerful and especially good in [Ocean's Descent].

basic_attack.name: Wave Chase
basic_attack.description: Perform a combo up to 4 hits. Charge Attack creates a powerful slash and consumes a [Sea God Mark] if full. Both scales with ATK + DEF.

my_passive_skill.name: Tide's Return
my_passive_skill.description: Consuming a [Sea God Mark] with Charged Attack also restores 0.5 ◆.

active_skill.name: Riptide Rend
active_skill.description: Dash forward dealing DMG based on your ATK + DEF.

firearm.name: Hunter Firearm
firearm.about: Firearm is a perfect choice if you’re new to LADS' combat. Doing combo is good for Boss stages. Charged attack deals multitarget DMG so it is good to utilize on mob stages but it takes more time to perform.

basic_attack.name: Precise Firing
basic_attack.description: Wield dual guns for a combo up to 5 hits. Charged Attack will knock back nearby enemies. Both Scales with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Weakpoint
passive_skill.description: 20% chance of dealing additional DMG on hit. When using [Active Skill] increases to 80%, additionally ATK Speed by 16%.

active_skill.name: In Hot Pursuit
active_skill.description: You perform one big DMG shot from your guns.

sword.name: Hunter Sword
sword.about: Feels good to play on boss stages.

basic_attack.name: Pierce
basic_attack.description: Perform a combo up to 4 hits. Charge Attack creates a single slash.  Both Scales with ATK. When [Hunter's Intention] is at 10 stacks, Charge Attack will be empowered.

passive_skill.name: Hunter's Intention
passive_skill.description: Gain s stack of [Hunter's Intention] for every instance of DMG up to 10 stacks. 1 stack increases ATK by 1.4%. Removes upon being hit.

active_skill.name: Blade's Shadow
active_skill.description: Unleash  a slashing attack dealing AoE DMG.

ward.name: Hunter Ward
ward.about: A perfect choice when you need a bit of healing for particular stages.

basic_attack.name: Magnetic Pulse
basic_attack.description: Wield a wand for a combo up to 4 hits. Charged Attack launches enemies. Both Scales with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Magnetic Resonance
passive_skill.description: Charge attack attack range's increased every 15s and deals massive ATK DMG.

active_skill.name: IMagnetic Nexus
active_skill.description: Creates a field that will inflict 6 instances of ATK DMG. When active restores HP to  you and your companion.

claymore.name: Hunter Claymore
claymore.about: Hunter Claymore is the most prominent standard weapon in the community due to its passive. Mastering [Gathering Stacks] are hard but really rewarding. To learn how to use them go to Training Room → Freestyle → Sustained Battle and practice here Dodge + 1 Basic Attack. Upon triggering it correctly you will be granted with one stack. Remember to collect all three before using [Active Skill] otherwise you will perform a much weaker hit. It can be used with any companion as other standard weapons but remember it scales with ATK so it is better not to use it with companions that use HP or DEF as their main stat.

basic_attack.name: Indomitable Edge
basic_attack.description: Wield a claymore for a combo up to 4 hits. Charged Attack makes you smash the ground dealing AoE DMG. Both Scales with ATK.

passive_skill.name: Persistence
passive_skill.description: Allows you to empower your [Active Skill] by 50% on [Gathering stacks] and skip the charging state. You should collect all three stacks to utilize that. One stack increases your [Basic Attack] by 12.9%.

active_skill.name: Frangere Slash
active_skill.description: Hold the button to charge your attack to deal big DMG, you can also press it to release an incomplete charge with smaller DMG.

skill_basic_info:.resonance_skill: Only that skill helps you to destroy enemy’s shiels. On full Stellactrum match destroys 2 layers of the shield.
skill_basic_info:.ardent_oath: Usually you can use it once during a battle, use Oath Recovery protocore to utilize it twice.
